item.title: Sell Divine Spirit Shield
item.dc:creator: @gunz4life gunz4life
item.description:
@gunz4life wrote:

[quote=“reyx7, post:13, topic:428066”][quote author=krackkid link=topic=530753.msg3876464#msg3876464 date=1325711669]

[quote author=gunz4life link=topic=530753.msg3876456#msg3876456 date=1325711469]

You’re on a nonmember world, trying to sell the shield? Even though I doubt you have one after your last image.

THIS IS A P2P WORLD -.-
[/quote]No its not, The summoning orb isn’t there smart guy. or did you shop that out when shopping the shield in?

The summoning orb isn’t there because he probably never completed the Wolf Whistle quest, however I saw the other picture, this one is probably fake too.
[/quote]Well he had to of completed the quest, He has a spirit shield which requires summer spirit and summer end to wear o.o

It’s fake, but he’s not wearing it. Your summoning circle is there if you haven’t completed the quest, though.[/quote]

Oh, than maybe it does show up. I know when I was doing the quest on my pure about a year ago it didn’t show up until afterwards:| Oh well, thanks for correcting me:P

Read full topic
